typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AboutMe} as string,
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> User
User filter(instr({_Location},'\r\n') == 0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Users.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
